titleStmt.title: Something in ansvver to the old Common-prayer-book and for the information of those who are for it, which is much of it taken out of the old Mass-book : both which are got up since the Apostles dayes ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662. Testimony concerning the Book of common prayer.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
